conbody.p: Euca2ools are a set of command-line user tools that can manage Eucalyptus objects including images, instances, security groups, IP addresses, keypairs, volumes, and so on. Euca2ools are located in the /usr/bin directory.
You can read about available options for each of the euca2ools commands by using one of the following methods:# <euca2ools_command> -h # <euca2ools_command> --help # man <euca2ools_command>

note.p: Not all euca2ools commands support all three command help methods.
